column4: is it possible to get a different resolution than 1280x1024 (native monitor resolution is 1680x1050) with Mesa?
well I wouldn't use gparted... but it is possible, sk33t0r
so what would you reccomend then
no, you can just adjust the size of your ext partition (provided you have enough free space) and use that free space or a part for your new ntfs partition
